pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Donald Tusk, President of the European Council | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with Donald Tusk, President of the European Council.  They discussed trade issues of mutual interest, including ratification of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive and Economic Trade Agreement, and recent developments with respect to the global trade.

The Prime Minister and the President shared perspectives on Canadaâ€™s G7 Summit in Charlevoix in June, 2018.

They also discussed political developments taking place within the European Union (EU) given the importance of the relationship between Canada and the EU.
